snippet: Russia’s top election official on Thursday shrugged off protesters’ demands that he step down over accusations of fraud during last month’s parliamentary election.
abstract: Russia’s top election official Vladimir Y Churov ignores protesters’ demands that he resign over accusations of fraud during the December 2011 parliamentary election, saying that he would listen only to the nation's leaders.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s top election official on Thursday shrugged off protesters’ demands that he step down over accusations of fraud during last month’s parliamentary election.

headline.seo: Russia: Vladimir Y. Churov, Election Chief, Will Not Resign
headline.main: Russia: Election Chief Will Not Resign
headline.print_headline: Russia: Election Chief Will Not Resign
